title: Airbnb Property Research Assistant
job_overview:
We are looking for a detail-oriented and reliable Virtual Assistant to help identify profitable rental properties for Airbnb arbitrage. Your role will be to search for rental apartments, evaluate their short-term rental profitability using a provided tool or website, and contact landlords of only the most promising properties.

Responsibilities:
Search Upgrade to see actual info for rental apartments in assigned cities/regions.

Evaluate each property’s Airbnb potential using a specific website tool (we’ll provide training).

Determine if the property meets profitability criteria.

Skip unqualified properties.

For qualified properties, send a message to the landlord using a provided template.

Log each qualified property and message sent in a shared spreadsheet.

Requirements:
Basic understanding of Airbnb and rental property concepts (we’ll train you).

Reliable internet access and computer.

Attention to detail and ability to follow step-by-step instructions.

Comfortable using Zillow and online evaluation tools.

Good English writing and communication skills.

Preferred (but not required):
Previous experience with Airbnb or real estate research.

Experience with Google Sheets or Excel.

Compensation:
Pay per hour or per qualified lead (negotiable based on experience).

Flexible schedule — work from anywhere.

Preferably 7 days a week, 3 hours per day.
